Package extra

Class StockBroker

java.lang.Object
extra.StockBroker
public class StockBroker
extends java.lang.Object
Represents communication between customers and the investment bank. Receives such information and processes it to send with publish/subscribe model.
Author:
Juan Diego Valencia Marin, Daniel Tomas Sanchez

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javax.jms.Connection connection
    Connection used in publish/subscribe model.

    Hash table where all enterprises are registered.
    private java.util.LinkedList<Quotation> quotations
    List where all quotations parsed from text are stored.
    private javax.jms.Session session
    Session used in publish/subscribe model.
    private javax.jms.Topic topic
    Topic used in publish/subscribe model.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    StockBroker()
    Constructs a extra.StockBroker containing all quotations from stock_prices.txt and initializes resources for connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • StockBroker

      public StockBroker()
      Constructs a extra.StockBroker containing all quotations from stock_prices.txt and initializes resources for connection.

  • Method Details

    • startConnection

      public void startConnection() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, javax.jms.JMSException
      It establish the StockBroker connection.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if stock_prices.txt is not found.
      javax.jms.JMSException - if fails the creation of the connection, session or topic.

    • getEnterprise

      private Enterprise getEnterprise​(java.lang.String ticker)
      Gets enterprise.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the ticker
      Returns:
      the enterprise

    • registerEnterprise

      public void registerEnterprise​(java.lang.String ticker, Enterprise enterprise)
      Register enterprise.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the ticker
      enterprise - the enterprise

    • storeAllQuotations

      private void storeAllQuotations() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Stores all quotations from stock_prices.txt in a LinkedList attribute.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if fails when the file can not be found.

    • getDayQuotations

      private java.util.ArrayList<Quotation> getDayQuotations()
      Gets all quotations of each day each time it is called if there are days remained.
      Returns:
      the quotations in a day contained in a list or null if all quotations have already been returned.

    • sendDailyQuotations

      public boolean sendDailyQuotations() throws javax.jms.JMSException
      Sends daily quotations contained in a list to subscribers if there are days remained. Otherwise do nothing.
      Returns:
      returns true if it has quations to send
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - if fails the creation of the message, setting, sending or closing.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws javax.jms.JMSException
      Closes following resources in the given order: publisher, session and connection.
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - if fails the closing of the session or connection.
